full_summary:
===============

### Tender Notice: Supply and Installation of 3 Tower Pivot

**Reference Number:** WS4083577169
**Solicitation Number:** WS4083577169
**Status:** Expired

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Regions of Delivery:** Lethbridge, Alberta

**Overview**: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), Lethbridge Laboratory, invites proponents to submit proposals for the supply, delivery, installation, and test run of a 3 tower pivot, as outlined in the specifications contained in Annex - Statement of Requirement.

**Closing Date:** September 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Please note that bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Point of Contact:** Andre Myers-Labbe, (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: Not provided
Email: [andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Document Details**: Additional information and tender documentation can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline external link: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17312104?extsite=MTczMTIxMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Please note that this rewritten entry has been condensed to adhere to the 400-word limit while maintaining the essential details. Markdown formatting has been applied to improve readability. The rewritten entry includes the following key points:

* Clear and concise overview of the tender
* Essential details for bidders, including the closing date and point of contact
* Important notice regarding the expiration of the tender
* Relevant details, including the trade agreements and points of contact
* A link to the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline for additional information and tender documentation.
